description: Take the pain out of breaking in a new pair of shoes. Built on the original formula, this formula adds apricot kernel oil, comfrey leaf extract, and vitamins A & C to help soften skin and minimize inflammation. Use it anywhere hot-spots, blisters or chafing are an issue.Stick application is fast and clean to apply.Hypoallergenic and has no animal by-products or been tested on animals. Vegan approved.Ingredients: caprylic/capric triglyceride, cetearyl alcohol, ozokerite wax, glyceryl behenate, stearyl alcohol, prunus armeniaca (apricot) kernel oil, symphytum officinale (comfrey) leaf extract, allantoin, tocopherol (vitamin e).Made with plant derived waxes, so store your Body Glide products at 15-30°C (59-86F).
name: Body Glide Foot Glide Original Anti-Blister Stick 10g
